website_summaries.verdict: The Canary View is a decent, affordable system if you want something basic, but it's missing too many features to be a strong all-in-one security device.
pros: Canary's $99 View is the least expensive all-in-one security system you can find
It works with Alexa and Google Assistant, and has free person alerts
cons: You have to subscribe to Canary's cloud service to access basic features like two-way talk, the web app and longer video clips
The View doesn't have a siren

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my canary for awhile and it has worked as promised. Now all the features I bought it for for are now part of a subscription service. My canary is useless now unless I pay. Please read all the negative reviews and the date they were posted. I’m not the only one upset with canary. Way to take care of the people that made you money canary!!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Bierer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Good picture/video quality. For the price, I really happy and I’ve discovered my dog sleeps on the coffee table when we’re not home!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Unforeseen Costs
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the device, the company highlighted the fact that the camera would feed an in-app video log with full-length videos showing the activity occurring during that time. It was on the basis of this claim that I bought the device so that I could effectively monitor my dog while at work. It worked really well for that purpose. Until they suddenly changed the terms of their free plan. Now, I see 10-second “summaries” (this means the first 10 seconds of whatever activity occurs) of activity, which is for my purposes useless. The only solution Canary provides is the “option” to pay $10/month for the “upgrade” that restores removed functionality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, Canary Home Security system
customer_reviews.text: It does not work as advertised. Apparently after a brief free period, the device and app will not send notifications as advertised. All I can determine is the purchasing membership is mandatory for the device to work as advertised. I've purchased two of the devices and am in the process of returning both. Client support is helpful, but not the best tin resolving problems. Item has not worked for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: John Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I made in a long time. I used to worry about my delivery at my front door. Not anymore. I get an alert and see exactly what they did. Where they left it. And if anyone come behind I can also tell if any foul play. Great camera. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Melvyn

customer_reviews.title: My landlord playing Snoop Dogg..😂
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Canary View and set it up the day before leaving for Florida on vacation. It surely paid off because I caught my landlord snooping around in the dark with a flashlight without permission or notification. I couldn't believe my eyes when I watched him on my smart phone. I am now moving the Heck out for my peace of mind and am totally indebted to canary view for showing me exactly what my landlord is. A total Snoop with no regard for this totally trusting tenant.. I'm disgusted with him and am so Glad I made this Fantastic purchase and highly recommend this product. It's awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: jrodnyc

customer_reviews.title: Need membership now - Free service has been downgraded!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Canary when I first started using it. It worked well (other than alerts for flying bugs) and the best part was that there was no monthly fees. NOW - I still receive VERY short videos with the notifications, but can only see the thumbnail of what caused the alarm, not enough to see the actual action (what happened before, during and after the snapshot). USELESS! If you just want to use it for "watch live," it might be fine (BTW it is delayed several seconds). Otherwise, you now must pay a membership fee. Disappointed, as the free membership was the deciding factor to buy it, for subcequent purchases and for personal recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: What a shame
customer_reviews.text: I was also scammed by this company. The recent update made it literally useless and and has a huge delay sometimes 5 or so minutes to clip it down to 12 seconds due to there new policies. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bucknutz69

customer_reviews.title: Never again! And now I’m stuck with it!
customer_reviews.text: The product was already used. I knew it as soon as I opened the box. It had fingerprints all over it and a mark from a drop of water. It was already set up in a different location which is making it difficult for me to set it up and use it. Talk about an “easy set up” as it states on the box. The pictures show how the product looked when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The device was really useful at first.... but now they have done an update that pretty much renders the device useless... the device will not even video.... because they want to force you to get a subscription...... very low move.... despicable.... this is definitely a greedy company....
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Got used camera, associated with somebody's account
customer_reviews.text: I purchased brand new one; tried to activate, got an error "that camera is already associated with another account ". Contacted to Canary customer service, they confirmed the camera I've got, it was already used by somebody else. So, why I've got used one as brand new should be delivered, not refurbish? Then Canary told me to "provide the proof of purchase" to make it available for setup. Even the camera looks good, and I like the design - activation experience and service ruines for me the potentially good product. Returning the camera back, looking at another products and services..
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch Scam
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The company just played another bait and switch scam with it's customers. Many people buy a device like this for it's ability to detect motion in the home while you are sleeping. Canary has now taken away the ability to switch to night mode unless you subscribe to their monthly pay plan. This is obviously a new strategy to get more people to switch to their pay plan. If I had known the company was planning to do this I would not have bought the device. Unless you plan to make monthly payments to Canary, DON'T BUY THIS DEVICE!! Even then I would be worried that they will change the conditions of your contract anytime they see fit.
customer_reviews.author: csb

customer_reviews.title: Terms of Service Changed
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of usage, Night Mode is no longer available unless a membership is purchased. Would not recommend purchase since terms have changed frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Another victim that got bait and switched by Canary.
customer_reviews.text: Add me to the list of victims that were taken advantage of by Canary. I purchased this camera knowing that they offered competitive features including full video recording, even when at home. On Oct 2, 2017, they removed this feature from existing customers and only made it available to paid memberships. I'm learning now that this is not the first time Canary has taken features away from previous plans. After a little research, I see that there is much better value offered from competitive brands. Time for me to trash my Canary for good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rivito

customer_reviews.title: Useless with new update
customer_reviews.text: Long time customer with 5 cameras at 2 locations. I researched your product for a long time prior to purchasing to insure it would meet my needs. Up until yesterday, it did. The sneaky change in service implemented by you was not the original service I purchased. My devices are now virtually useless for my purpose without an overpriced subscription. I am now forced to seek a new security provider. Highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: LaCop188

customer_reviews.title: Terrible business model
customer_reviews.text: The initial promise of free recording and night vision has all gone away... Now to have basic functionality its 9.99 a month. Do not buy this bait and switch company. Terrible business model....
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This device used to be great when the free tier included full videos for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This device used to be great when the free tier included full videos for a short time. Unfortunately the company has pulled a bait and switch on customers by removing this (and other) features from the free plan essentially forcing users into the paid plan if they want to actually use all of the features of the camera. The hardware for the camera is quite good however at this point I can't recommend buying this product because you never know what features the company will remove next. If you are willing to pay the monthly fee it may be ok.
customer_reviews.author: ChaosJester87

customer_reviews.title: but now since the policy change I would not recommend it to any of my friends or family
customer_reviews.text: Purchased canary and also the flex a couple of months ago before they changed the policy on subscription. At the time if I were to give a rating it would’ve been 4-5, but now since the policy change I would not recommend it to any of my friends or family. With the basic plan, it’s barely even usable. I would be better off going to a cheaper alternative like Yi cam instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: OK camera. All of the services are 'premium' now.
customer_reviews.text: I want to reiterate the same frustration that everyone else has with this device. The selling point, for me, was that they recorded 24 hours of video for free. If you wanted more storage than that then you paid a premium. Now they've taken that feature away and tried to make it sound like they were doing you a big favor. There are cheaper, better cameras on the market. I bought this one for the service, but evidently they can (and will) change that when it suits them.
customer_reviews.author: Luke G.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, sudden service conditions change
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this device for about a year, from the beginning I couldn't use PayPal to buy a membership (just credit card), so I wrote them, but they never added payment options. Now suddenly most of the basic features are paid, so this is becoming a piece of junk...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, navigating the app takes a short period of time to master. I have accepted that I need to turn on and off settings when we get home and wake up. I would do the same thing with a typical hard wired alarm system. With this device (we have two) it records and saves what it sees, which is great, and the purpose. However, recording yourself while at home and notifying others that you authorize to see the video is not always a good plan. Maybe running to the dryer to grab a shirt while not being fully dressed. My point, turn off the video recording feature when you are at home.
customer_reviews.author: DJNOVA

customer_reviews.title: Canary Broken After Updates
customer_reviews.text: Canary has removed advertised features and broken their software in order to force a membership subscription. Once a company shows the short sighted choice of cutting services and intentionally crippling a purchased device, you have to assume they will continuously raise price while cutting service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Non functional without monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.text: This product was fair when first purchased. It would often drop internet connection even though wifi was less than 20 feet away. Now though canary has updated their "contract" and unless you pay a monthly fee there is very little this device does. I can't even watch live video stream from my own bedroom of the front door. Unless I "activate" membership (monthly fee). I realize they have bills to pay but that is not how this was advertised when purchased. I will be contacting amazon about returning the device since manufacturer has changed the rules of the contract.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality!
customer_reviews.text: After having the Canary Flex for about a week, I've been very impressed with the quality of the video captured. I like how convenient it is to quickly view what's happening in my apartment easily from any phone I happen to be using at the time. The Canary Flex was able to quickly adjust to various lighting conditions (I have a window that can bring a lot of bright sunlight into my apartment at certain times in the day) to provide the best image.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No longer worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are now charging for night mode and to see recorded videos....no longer worth it research other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Davis

customer_reviews.title: We love the Canary Flex
customer_reviews.text: We love the Canary Flex. Simple set up, good quality, easy to use and portable. We have used it to keep an extra eye on the house while our son is home alone, and he likes the extra secure feeling of knowing that we are "there." Great addition to our home and provides extra piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: theknittingniece

customer_reviews.title: Let's play remove-a-feature!
customer_reviews.text: Every year they seem to remove a feature. It started with free recordings, to reduced visibility to recordings to no recordings if you're at home to monitor the place when you're sleeping. What's next? Uuuugggghhhh!!!
customer_reviews.author: EdGy

customer_reviews.title: I have had this device for almost two years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this device for almost two years. Over those two years the benefit of a free membership has slowly eroded updated after updated. This latest update has essentially made the Canary worthless without a very expensive paid membership. You used to get 7 days worth of video which was weaned down to 24hrs and now after this latest updated you get just 10 second video clips that cant be saved.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: terrible reliability; it captures about 30% of what it ...
customer_reviews.text: terrible reliability; it captures about 30% of what it should, and when it does capture something its not the entire clip. For instance, I was notified that someone was in my backyard (which was perfect), then as i watched the video the cliip ended right as this person was getting to my backdoor so i have no idea what happened next. Absolutely terrible, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: hernajam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my canary for almost a year and loved it. It used to be the perfect option for me since I’ve been adjusting to the creaks and cracks of a new home. Like many others, Canary has screwed us with their new changes. Night time, the time when most invasions occur, is now only available for $10 a month. Night mode will force your system to stop recording and can’t be tricked out of it. Don’t waste your money. Adam Sager, the CEO, I hope you sleep at night thinking about how you’ve just completely disregarded your customers and people they’ve referred.
customer_reviews.author: nfrank2

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch - avoid this company and its products
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave many reviews, but after recent company decisions and its approach to communicating the changes to its loyal customers, I felt compelled to write one this time around. After making a purchase decision over a year ago based upon the features offered by the Canary -- and being a satisfied customer who subsequently purchased other Canary products -- they have now eliminated most of the functionality and turned the features into a monthly, paid (expensive) membership model, vastly reducing the value of the devices. Whether or not their product is better than other options no longer matters to me; this company is one that cannot be trusted. I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Massie

customer_reviews.title: You DON'T want a Canary!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! After owning this for almost a year Canary has made changes trying to force me to buy a membership to have access to features that were free when I purchased it. I did a lot of research deciding to buy Canary over others because you could view recordings for 24 hours without having to buy a membership. A membership would give access to recordings for a month. Also, I can no longer set it to night mode without buying a membership. So they made these changes and didn't grandfather in those of us who had already purchased their product. Not the kind of company I want to do business with!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain free way to add remote camera
customer_reviews.text: Fairly painless to set up, and it doesn't look like a camera. Noticed it's a bit slow to turn on once someone comes in range. Picture quality is acceptable. Basic service that comes with the app is good enough, but you need to view pics/vids within 24 hours. Don't know if there's a way to save them. Ultimately sent back, as the CEO is a MAGA nut, which doesn't exactly inspire confidence, considering a breech of their security means you have randos watching you through the cam.
customer_reviews.author: J-Money

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic... until Oct 2nd
customer_reviews.text: Basically, everything that made you his camera fantastic is now gone, effective Oct 2nd - I was very happy with the motion recording and being able to view the 10 minute long recordings that were held for 24hrs - now the free plan has barely 30 seconds of motion recording and no (free) night mode - and is it just me but even the 30 sec snippets are very pixeled and unclear - now. You've got to pay for the basics - I made the BIG mistake of purchasing 2 more of these about 5 months ago - so now I've got 3 paperweights. Thanks Canary, for turning a once great product into an expensive waste.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie L

customer_reviews.title: $$$$$ and still no help.
customer_reviews.text: FRUSTRATING! I set up one device in my mother's memory care facility in OK the day before we left to go back to WA. At first it was great! I could talk to her and her caregivers live and monitor that she was given care at scheduled times, night or day. Today, Live feed stopped and I cannot determine the cause. Worse, no way to receive live help, even after purchasing a $99 year's membership. So now I have 2 devices, a $99 membership, plus a 3 year protection plan, and it isn't working.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Removed my access to recordings of my home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about 2 years ago. It was good, but Canary suddenly changed how it works. As of about 2 weeks ago Canary won't let me see any recordings they are taking of my home they are taking unless I pay a subscription fee. Also they now turned off my camera when it gets dark.
customer_reviews.author: KesDl

customer_reviews.title: there customer service is good, but the actual product quality just DOES NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Under the "free" version, whose function and description was the sole reason I purchased a Canary: Canary used to store WHOLE video clip for 24 hours, now it stores a small snippet clip and requires you to subscribe to the monthly fee to store and view the whole video. If I knew there was a monthly charge for it, I would not have gotten a Canary. The app is full of bugs and does not work often times, wont switch modes, notifications come DELAYED, there customer service is good, but the actual product quality just DOES NOT WORK and this is one of those items whose quality needs to work, for security purposes over its customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TKO-56A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. Really love the quality and the comfort it gives me
customer_reviews.author: Claire C

customer_reviews.title: Canary moved many useful features like night mode behind a membership paywall
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Canary moved many useful features like night mode behind a membership paywall.
customer_reviews.author: James Y

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera but recent changes to their free services makes this camera basically useless unless you want to pay a monthly membership fee.. They have left us vulnerable over night without notice because the free Night and Home modes are no longer included in the basic services. Shame, Shame, Shame on you Canary!
customer_reviews.author: pmk

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and really love them. Great resolution, two-way audio, humidity and air quality. I love that the temperature is showing as well since every room in my house has a different temperature and I have animals so I need to make sure in really bad hot days they are fine in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Z.

customer_reviews.title: Canary just took away night mode after selling the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Canary just took away night mode after selling the product to me by saying there are no storage fees. Now the device doesn’t work unless you pay yearly or monthly. Junk. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: The recent change makes it impossible to use without a ...
customer_reviews.text: The recent change makes it impossible to use without a paid membership. I made my purchase decision based off their past features which no longer exist...very frustrating!! Don't buy!!! Company is corrupt and I will no longer endorse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used to be happy with it but now I will be looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had my system for over a year now but as other have said they just killed off all the features that the system originally came with. Now it costs $10 a month for anything but the most basic functions. Not to mention every update they did results in issues with the automatic switching. I used to be happy with it but now I will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bad reviews lately on the Canary cloud storage pricing. For me, this has worked pretty good and I am ok with paying 9.99/month to monitor 2 cameras. Note, they don’t provide masking capability with the flex. The magnet that mounts this is strong and good battery life. Startup could be quicker at times, and sometimes the recording starts later than I would hope for. Use this product to monitor your house, but dont expect it to replace an alarm system. Notifications are typically a couple minutes or more after activity is picked up by the camera.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kratky

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My canary did not even make it to one year. It was great while it lasted, but then it started going haywire. If I could figure out how to let Amazon know it no longer works and I would like a new one or my money back that would be great. But alas, there seems no place to voice my problem. Other than in a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Fuller

customer_reviews.title: FEES CHARGED NOW  beware  and sorry I recommended it to friends
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE was one of the best cameras and apps out there I tried then ALL now they are charging for storage when it was FREE for 24 hours of video now its worthless unless you pay for subscription DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE LOCKED INTO PAYING A MONTHLY FEE for a FEE there are better options
customer_reviews.author: Infinitiboi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA ----> But was tricked by free services that were taken away.
customer_reviews.text: ME IN 2016: I LOVE THIS CAMERA. What a great deal! All I need is 12 hours worth of recording! And it's free! Also, it records 24/7 (and I can view 12 hours worth of footage!) ME IN 2017: Oh, you want to take away 100% of the free features and only record when I'm gone? What happens if someone breaks into my home while I'm there (or it thinks I'm there)? Oh, I have to pay $120/year for that? Nope. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Miller

customer_reviews.title: It has made the product completely useless unless you subscribe for $100/year
customer_reviews.text: Canary has just made a change to their free video plan. It has made the product completely useless unless you subscribe for $100/year. Wish I knew the change was coming before I bought it. At this point it is not good for recorded video. It still works for checking the temperature of you house. Total waste. Update... I did chat with Canary and they will not agree to a return. Unit was purchased on August 2nd and the service change was just over 60days. Really bad. Amazon should drop this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY, BAIT AND SWITCH, DISHONEST
customer_reviews.text: Used to be good, not anymore. Few weeks ago they decided to start charging if you like to see the full videos. This was free up to 24 hours period. Do you really want to buy something and they change the "rules of the game" later ? I wish I can return it , but I am past the return period. Ask them many times to roll back the free service - they refuse. Looking for legal advice how to get my money back. Class action lawsuit against Canary sounds the best thing to do at this point !
customer_reviews.author: Bistra Stankov

customer_reviews.title: They’ve been having really good sales lately and I was thinking of buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. They continue to take more and more options away from the free membership. They’ve been having really good sales lately and I was thinking of buying a couple more but then the biggest update came. Now free users can only get motion detection notifications when they are away from home. I guess they think crime only happens when the homeowner is away. I think a class action law suit is coming down the pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro

customer_reviews.title: they change it so the device is basically useless unless you paid a monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: Bait and Switch. Bought this product with the promise that there was no monthly fee. Out of the blue, without telling anyone, they change it so the device is basically useless unless you paid a monthly fee. I used to use this for my childs room to monitor him at night, now that night feature is not available unless i pay 9.99. I think they need to pay back all the users who bought this when they clearly advertised no monthly fees. Or at least grandfather in the early adopters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subscription or camera is useless
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for me when I first purchased it. Downside range isn't too great so I couldn't really use it outdoors. The one thing that made it bad was the change in your own camera settings. If you opt out of the subscription you don't get to decide how to set your camera preferences. That's the whole reason I purchased this. Now it's being controlled by Canary and limiting my ability to use and make this product useful for my own purpose. They want you to subscribe. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: CGC

customer_reviews.title: They charge fees for basic functionality now - Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: They are sticking it to you on the storage plans. They make a decent camera but sell it for significant dollars and then ask for nearly that amount annually for 30 day video retrieval. I used to love their product but am no longer a fan because of their business practices.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Loved the camera before the bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Loved the camera before the bait and switch. Now you can’t even see videos unless you pay an annual membership fee. Useless otherwise. This will be a classic story of how a company tanks from a horrible decision to bleed profits from current users.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Alternatives are cheaper and better
customer_reviews.text: The Canary is overpriced for the unit and overpriced for its membership. The camera used to be just overpriced at $200 when I purchased it. Now t they dropped the price a bit (still higher than alternatives) and decided to take away almost all functionality if you don't pay a monthly/annual membership fee. There are plenty of alternatives out there that work better than the Canary does (less frequent outages, more functionality) for a better price and NO MEMBERSHIP (i.e. Amcrest). Look elsewhere for your home security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Janice/Scott

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED due to forced subscription
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice, the manufacture advertising free service, few months later (After you can no longer return the devices) Canary co is now forcing subscribers to purchase a $14.95 subscription, I bought 4 of these and I can't even use them after less then a year, what a scam!!! very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SiMohammed

customer_reviews.title: A total waste now. Thanks Canary
customer_reviews.text: Key features recently removed. A total waste now. Thanks Canary.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Arita

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's unbelievable that they start charging for features that were included at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: If you love late or no notification buy this
customer_reviews.text: If you like to get your notification 20 minutes or hours after an intrusion this is your huckleberry. I had a car battery stolen off my back deck 2 times in October and did not even get one video or notification. It will notify me and record a bug on the lens though. I have the KUNA system in our Hawaii home and always get immediate notification and video in Portland Oregon but these Canary will not notify me 20 feet away. Canary is very hit and miss. If you want notifications and real notification buy a KUNA for your outdoor security. I have 3 outdoor flex systems all working poorly or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Put it in my mother's home while ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Put it in my mother's home while she was traveling. Alerted me by text message when the cleaning lady came into the house and I saw her. Also, allowed me to see the temperature in the house to avoid freezing temps. Great product !! I highly recommend it to keep an eye on your home while you are away. After buying the Canary, we did not have to pay extra for the monitoring of the home. Just need wireless and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lis C.

customer_reviews.title: No longer recommend—Bait and switch service
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I cannot recommend any longer. I have 3 of these devices, but with the recent October changes to the service, I no longer can trust Canary for my needs. Lately the app has been buggy and unreliable while they expect to upsell free membership to paid by putting previously free aspects of the service behind a minimum of $9.99 per month (more devices results in higher monthly fee). I originally bought these because they were going to add audio communication— this ended up going behind the pay service as well. I can forgive new (albeit promised) features requiring additional investment, but I cannot abide free features being moved as well.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great
customer_reviews.text: I spent $600 on cameras. Worked great. Then they changed their business model. These are worthless now without paying a yearly subscription. So now the dilemma. Throw away $600 worth of cameras and buy a new system, or pay Canary’s “ransom” so these things actually work and record again. Really angry with this company. Guess I’m stuck paying the yearly ransom. Your plan worked Canary. Congratulations. Please don’t spend it all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All promise but pure greed.  bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: We have had a canary and and flex for about 3 years now. When first purchased they adverted a lot of "upcoming features" with no member of membership. Now with a big swoop they are charging a membership for features such as: real time talk, night node, viewing recordings - whats next??? They have truly bait and switched us all - which is unethical. We are selling back our Canarys for whatever we can get. Simple Safe and Ring are now better options.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Abilities are slowly going from free to paid.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be great. I was able to record movement and watch live from different modes for free. Now you have yo pay a subscription if you want to do anything. Which is a load of bull because I paid a lot for the services when I bought the equipment. Now they want you to pay again to use the stuff you already were using. Extortion if you ask me. The ONLY reason I still have if plugged in, is to measure the air quality. At least that’s still free. Unless they give us back what was already ours, then do no buy one. You will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: BorgCzar

customer_reviews.title: Canary is a sinking ship.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from canary. As you've probably read already, these cameras are basically useless now after the latest update.. They force you into purchasing a membership to access basic camera functions.. video recording are 5 seconds long now! Buyer beware!! This company is going under faster than the Titanic
customer_reviews.author: Liz Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.text: They removed basic functionality and features without warning and try to charge for an expensive subscription model. Don't waste your time and money with this company - I recommend BLINK cameras - half the price, great quality and no subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Get the Blink security system instead
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. I thought the membership prices were a little too steep so I opted only for the free version, which included 24 hour monitoring and night time monitoring. Canary recently reversed its decision to include these features, requiring membership to have these functions. This camera is therefore useless without the membership and is very deceiving it what it had previously advertised. Update 10-19-17 I was able to contact Amazon and ask for a refund after telling them that Canary has promoted a bait and switch product despite it being outside their usual return time (4 months). Love Amazon customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted the 12-month bundled subscription, the security aspects of having a camera, as well as the remote monitoring capabilities of temperature/air quality/etc. This model does not support the air monitor - it looks just like the one that does, but for some reason these instruments were completely left out. I suppose this is my fault somehow, but when I was toggling between the two devices, it appeared to me that this was the camera + 12 month subscription. There's no asterisk next to the description on here or their website to indicate that HomeHealth is limited to a specific model. I'm going to sleep on it and then likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken - was replaced
customer_reviews.text: This was the second All-in-One that I purchased and I was very frustrated by it not connecting to my WiFi system. After hours of effort and a very slow, poor quality response from the manufacturer, the device was replaced. The replacement worked perfectly at the first attempt. These are normally very well made and are an easy way to monitor the temperature, air quality, and movements at your property.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Now that I have bought their cameras they have changed their system in the last update and basically made these cameras useless by REQUIRING YOU TO ACTIVATE A MEMBERSHIP IF YOU ...
customer_reviews.text: Over the course of the last year I bought 4 of these cameras for my home and a big reason for my purchases was I wanted a security camera without a monthly subscription, that’s what they advertised, no monthly fees. Now that I have bought their cameras they have changed their system in the last update and basically made these cameras useless by REQUIRING YOU TO ACTIVATE A MEMBERSHIP IF YOU WANT TO RECEIVE AND VIEW ANY RECORDINGS. They baited me in and then changed the entire game. I will never buy anything else from this company again or from anyone associated with them. I can’t even believe this is legal!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jfh

customer_reviews.title: Canary Down hill slide
customer_reviews.text: It was great in the beginning, however recently if you select not to become a member and pay a fee, you lose almost all of the cameras functions. I have tried to contact the company about the issues, however the phone number on the help paper work no longer works. 800-271-0121
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't BUY - product requires overprices service plan!
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok until they changed there program. Now the Flex is useless unless you fork over 9.99 month service plans!
customer_reviews.author: Matt W. Ruff

customer_reviews.title: WARNING CHECK TO MAKE SURE THESE ARE NEW BEFORE SETTING UP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I recently Bought this Canary 2 pack from amazon. For whatever reason, amazon is selling returned Canaries and listing them as new. This is reprehensible to say the least. The problem is, people are registering their canaries online, and then returning them WITHOUT removing their registration. This renders the canary useless for the next user, which is what happened to me (each canary can be setup and registered to only 1 user in 1 location at any given time). Returning this and waiting for a new one to come to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dishonest bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Changed product to where it's completely useless without paid subscription. Not what was advertised when I bought it 15 months ago. Buggy. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, 100.00 bucks a year if you want it to work. Won’t record unless in “away” mode and it will send you notifications every second there’s a movement.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want a streaming camera. All great features now for members only. Better off with ADT.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Canary back when it would let you have a night mode and home mode. They essentially took away every feature unless you can dish out 10-15$ a month. Canary is a sneaky company who now sells a streaming device and took away all great features without a formal notification. Used to be able to see video recordings for 24 hours if motion detected and now that's only for members. Unless they change this would not recommend to anyone. Thanks for the $160 streaming device Canary.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this two months ago as a subscription free way to monitor my house. The company just undercut it's main selling point by making the videos it records both useless snippets AND undownloadable. Save your money and look elsewhere unless you plan to spend $15 a month on their plan.
customer_reviews.author: danielle Goudeau

customer_reviews.title: Go with Ring! I would NOT buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is virtually useless unless you pay for their membership now. It wasnt always like this, but they've slowly taken away all the basic (free) incentives to buy this product. You can't get anything except a 10 second snippet unless you pay and most of that snippet isnt relevant. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis H.

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Opening a complaint with the BBB, want to get a full refund or they reinstate the full free service that was prior to oct 3 2017. This is bait and switch. This thing is about useless unless you pay for the service. very glitchy and not reliable at times but good when it works. This is on both the flex and the all in one as i purchased both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch - nothing free with this camera - beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this minus stars. This was the second canary we purchased. We have always used the free service to view alerts. They have now shut off every feature to free users trying to force them onto a monthly subscription. They advertised it as fully functional free then shut everything off! I see a class action suit in the future!!! What a horrible company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the device to record movement when you go to sleep used to be included when you buy the device. The company made a change that now requires users to pay a monthly fee for that. The change affects everyone, previous and new customers. Who knows what will they be doing next? I will look for a refund or class action suit, and if I was someone considering a security camera, I would look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Scam!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a waste! I purchased this because it was an affordable option for home security as I can not afford to pay per month. I WHOLEHEARTLEDLY REGRET this purchase as now a membership is REQUIRED for all the things that were free. What if I am not home at night and someone breaks in? What a joke. I am getting rid of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Loved my canary when I bought it almost two years ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved my canary when I bought it almost two years ago. The ability to have passive home monitoring and download video if anything happens was what sold me. Recently canary has limited this function so you only get 10s preview so if it detects activity you can barely tell what it is. Now it's pretty much a paper waight. A real slap in the face to a loyal customer who sold others on buying this device. All this just to force user into paying $10 for the subscription service. Would not buy again. I am amazed a company would take key features away from loyal customers just to push new services and attempt to push them into paying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought my canary about a year ago. Stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my canary about a year ago. Stopped working 6 months in. Messaged tech support and told me to try everything they told me and nothing worked. Now I'm seeing about the charges for different packages and it's ridiculous. Never buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: No more night mode???? I have ...
customer_reviews.text: No more night mode???? I have to pay monthly for the same feature I had since my purchase two years ago? Whaaaaaaat?
customer_reviews.author: K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Product frequently fails to switch modes (home/away), and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product frequently fails to switch modes (home/away), and the company has gradually reduced the utility of the included service. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: Was great, now the service is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Was a good run until the latest round of limitations on the free service fame in to play. It’s worthless to me now. Anyone want to buy a used one?
customer_reviews.author: P. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Classic bait and switch.
customer_reviews.text: Same here; I bought this device and loved it. Today I find out that Canary is changing their business model. To keep the same service I got a year ago for free, I will now have to pay $150 a year. Classic bait and switch. No longer recommending their products. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: John Santos

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy, know that they are NOW charging for Night Mode & 2way. Bait & Switch! DO NOT buy this
customer_reviews.author: Si Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beware the subscription requirement
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product, unless you pay a subscription for thier service the camera is very limited. It will not record unless you manuelly set it too,then automatically jumps back to a none recording mode. Though the product itself is of high material quality the software is eaither very poorly designed or, more likely, designed to force you to buy an expensive subscription. There are other products out there of rhe same quality without the pay to use requirement i would advise you not to buy this unless you are prepared to pay a hefty monthly subscription
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great look, quality feel
customer_reviews.text: Great look, quality feel. Just doesn't do what it's supposed to; Have settings set to auto-away/home switch. Does not work. When motion detection (which I have to manually turn on, as the auto-switch does not work) is active, I get alerts that "It looks like there is a person at home" It is always the fan spinning. It was worth a shot, but with all the options in this space, I would NEVER buy a product from this company again. UPDATE* did not mention how the software update made this completely obsolete. If you are not paying member you don't even see full clips, let alone have them saved. Total trash. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - a $$ subscription is required for any true functionality
customer_reviews.text: The device quality itself is great - nice image quality, etc. HOWEVER, although marketed as a standalone unit with no need for subscription services (unless you chose to upgrade), the maker has pretty much disabled all functionality UNLESS you subscribe to a plan that costs at least $100/yr for one unit. The device is practically useless without the subscription fees. They need to be clear about this in their marketing. Until then, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Goes the Culture

customer_reviews.title: I recommend getting the Arlo Pro instead of this
customer_reviews.text: It became a bait and switch product. It no longer has 24 hour free recording storage and night mode. I recommend getting the Arlo Pro instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Will push you to buy membership then cut off your camera
customer_reviews.text: When cameras are set up you will get bombarded with emails to buy the membership over and over. If you refuse, the cameras mysteriously will ALL stop working in about 6 months after you have invested tons of money into them. If you email support they will play chicken with you taking days to respond telling you it is your email set up address. The actual camera has a great picture, audio, and sturdy structure, but the constant harassment to buy the membership and total absence of tech support will push me to dispose all of these camera and invest elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazontee

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere in the advertisement did it indicate you had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the advertisement did it indicate you had to subscribe to a yearly or monthly service service for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Service and Support!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product support. If you have a problem, you can’t find a human to talk to. Web site is a series of mazes, leading you nowhere, until you give up. They push updates down, not fully tested. And push you to buy a full subscription. Not customer friendly! My broken unit is being returned to Amazon. They were no help either. There are much better choices out there!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this scam
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great product, until the Oct 17 update ruined everything. It seems like 90% of the features that drew me into buying this product have since been removed. I wish I could return it but we’ve owned it for close to a year. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gaglione

customer_reviews.title: For remote use, battery life is extremely limited.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Several weeks ago I moved this device inside. Very disappointed with Canary; it is an unreliable and buggy platform. Stops working sporadically and when you contact support you get "it's YOUR WiFi/Internet connection." No, no it's not. A lot of money for tremendous unreliability​. I bought this to monitor my front door. I was hoping I didn't need to run power to the porch roof so the battery option sounded good. Battery life is extremely limiting. I turned the sensitivity down and it wouldn't detect a person at the front door. To detect a person at the door the motion sensitivity had to be turned up. At that level the battery was dead in about 4-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage and the worst thing I have ever wasted money on!
customer_reviews.text: This “security camera” is straight up junk. 3 easy steps for set up? I don’t think so. After trying to set it up for 2 weeks, I am giving up. I hear the picture is good but I will never know. I have been a prime member for years and have never once written a review for good or bad, but this item deserves the recognition for being absolutely garbage. I bet the landfills around the world have a ton of these in them. I can’t even give a no star rating because you need to give it something to submit a review.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Stuber
